chunk:
Lowen's Natural Skin Care You Sure Clean Up Nice! Face & Body Cleanser

Brand: Lowen's Natural Skin Care

Category: Body Wash/Cleanser
book: 0090-Lowen's Natural Skin Care You Sure Clean Up Nice! Face & Body Cleanser

chunk:
Category: Body Wash/Cleanser

Ingredients: Aqua, Coco-Betaine (Coconut), Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate (Coconut), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Oleosomes, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil
book: 0090-Lowen's Natural Skin Care You Sure Clean Up Nice! Face & Body Cleanser

chunk:
Directions: : pump a small amount of this incredible and gentle cleanser to your palm and work gently into a light lather and massage onto your face to remove make-up, dirt, oil and other related undesirables. Add water for extra foaming action if desired.

Warnings: For external use only
book: 0090-Lowen's Natural Skin Care You Sure Clean Up Nice! Face & Body Cleanser
